summary: 2000 GMC YUKON XL.  FUEL LEAK IN MY GARAGE AFTER FILLING GAS TANK.  LEAKED AT LEAST 6-8 GALLONS OF FUEL INTO GARAGE.  SERVICE FACILITY DIAGNOSED PROBLEM TO BE FAULTY PLUNGER IN FUEL PUMP.  VERY DANGEROUS, SINCE MY GARAGE CONTAINS GAS HOT WATER HEATER WITH PILOT.  HAZARDOUS MATERIAL CLEANUP (REQUIRED BY FIRE DEPARTMENT) COST $1600.  *NLM
